about:content:
[![Kui: The CLI with a GUI twist](icons/svg/kui-wide.svg)](http://kui.tools)
**Kui** is a platform for enhancing the terminal experience with visualizations. It provides users a modern alternative to ASCII terminals and web-based consoles. It provides tool developers an opportunity to unify these experiences.
